title: Барышня-Крестьянка. Россия | Селянка-Горожанка
overview: The legendary reality show is back! Two girls from different walks of life take part in the reality experiment "The Young Lady-Peasant Woman". A rich heroine from the city who is not used to counting money, and a poor villager who only knows about the luxurious life from pictures in magazines or TV programs. The heroines will get to know each other's family and friends, as well as fully experience the difference in their social status and lifestyle. For a poor girl, the project becomes a unique opportunity to see another life, and for a young lady - to test herself for strength and rethink her own life.Every morning the heroines receive a new list of tasks from each other. In the final, they will meet at a round table, where they will be able to get to know each other and exchange impressions.
